title: fern_dev
name: Rhyn Hilt
currently: Studying full-stack web development with a special interest in the terminal.
description:
I'm Rhyn Hilt (fern_d3v), a new developer currently exploring full-stack web, game, and CLI tool development.
I'm driven by a passion for problem-solving and love creating things that are both functional and joyful.
Outside of coding, I'm an avid fantasy reader, Souls-like gamer, and TTRPG enthusiast.
I'm always open to connecting with fellow creators and problem-solvers.
fun_fact: I lived in Turkey for a month when I was 19. I still remember a few words in Turkish.
